name: SUV Drive 3D
description:
Do you have what it takes to drive a real 3D SUV car on the highland?

Find the green area to start a challenge.

Climb up the mountain and collect gold coins on the way.

Earn bonuses by completing tasks within limited time and get enough coins to buy new cars!

- 12 detailed SUV-kind cars

- Real car physics

- 3D graphics and easy-to-use controls
